title: whoops reported axidently
body: Well the thing is i thought i was playing rank but i was not(once u are in game is hard to tell if it rank or not). well thins player went afk because he wanted to go have lunch toward the end of the game when we were about to win(we lost so you can understand my incidental anger). then i reported the guys but now i feel bad that i reported him because it was just a normal game. how could I undo this so this player does not get punish.

replies.body:
I agree with *Wolfess*, if that person did go AFK, even in a normal match, the report was not unwarranted. Bear in mind that we don't generally permaban someone off a single report, and with AFK's especially, the automated system deals with them based on their behaviour. If someone exhibits a trend of disconnections, they'll end up in low-priority queue.

Regardless of game mode, all summoner should aspire to display [behavior worthy of a champion.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751874-Behavior-Worthy-of-a-Champion) Let me know if you have any questions.

You can't undo it.
If they left to eat and were afk as you said, then they deserve the report. They should make sure they have enough time to see the game through under normal circumstances. Emergencies CAN happen at times, but going to go eat isn't such an emergency.

1. Reports don't get one punished, bad behaviour does.
2. Leaving to eat is bad behaviour.
